ingredients:
<hr>
### NOTE: this is purely for dev/testing and is copied from Oporto
<hr>

#### Lettuce:
Iceberg Lettuce.

####  Spicy Rice:
Water, Rice, Onion, Tomato [Tomato, Acidity Regulator (330), Firming Agent (509)], Capsicum, Flavour (Wheat) (Flavour Enhancer (627, 631)), Canola Oil, Spices and Herbs, Lemon Juice Concentrate, Garlic, Salt, Vegetable Gums (412, 415), Sugar.

#### Butter Spray:
Vegetable Oil, Natural Flavour, Acidity Regulator (330).

#### Grilled Corn:
Sweet Corn Kernels (58%), Water, Salt.

####  Portuguese Tomato Salad:
Tomato, Green Capsicum, Red Onion.

#### Chicken:
Chicken (88%), Marinade (12%) [Water, Salt, Sugar, Mineral Salts (451, 450, 452, 341), Food Acids (262, 331, 330), Maltodextrin, Vegetable Powder, Flavourings, Yeast Extract, Vinegar Powder, Vegetable Gums (415), Vegetable Oil (Canola), Spice Extracts].

#### Lemon & Herb Sauce:
Water, Vegetable Oil, Maltodextrin, Vinegar, Sugar, Thickeners (1442, 415), Lemon Juice Concentrate (2.7%), Garlic, Salt, Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Flavour Enhancer (621), Spice, Herbs (0.2%), Preservative (202), Flavour, Emulsifier (433), Antioxidant (385), Colour 100.

#### Seasoned Avocado:
Avocado, Salt, Food Acids (270, 300), Vegetable Gum (415).

|             |Allergen   | Information                       |             |
|-------------|-----------|-----------------------------------|-------------|
|__Gluten__   |Present  |__Added Sulphites (> or = 10ppm)__ |Not Present  |
|__Eggs__     |Traces  |__Shellfish__                      |Not Present  |
|__Milk__     |Traces  |__Royal Jelly__                    |Not Present  |
|__Tree Nuts__|Not Present  |__Peanuts__                        |Not Present  | 
|__Sesame__   |Not Present  |__Lupin__                          |Not Present  |
|__Soy__      |Traces  |__Fish__                           |Not Present  |

The average adult daily energy intake is 8700kJ.

* Please note, most of our burgers and rappas contain mayonnaise which is made from eggs. If you order these items without mayonnaise, prego sauce or garlic sauce the 'Egg Allergen' may no longer apply.

[View our disclaimer](https://www.oporto.com.au/menu-disclaimer/)
